April 22, 2007 D SCABA Spring Contest (First Section)
SCABA Spring Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Spring Contest scaba-spring-contest-first-section
Town Hall, Hove, Sussex Best March: Horsham Borough Best Bass Section: Chichester City Best Horn Section: Horsham Borough Best Tenor Trombonist: Blair Sinclair, St. Albans City Best Bass Trombonist: Steve Anker, St. Albans City Conductor's Prize: John Williams, Chichester City
May 3, 2012, 9:49 p.m. March 23, 2017, 4:30 p.m.
